text: I have been going to that grocery store recently.
We have been watching too much TV lately.
You have been reading that newspaper for two hours.
He has been playing piano for 2 years.
She has been feeling ill.
He had a great army.
There were many others who wanted to become king.
They started plotting against him.
Then they started killing those trusted friends.
People were anxious and unhappy.
每个人都有他的作战策略，直到脸上中了一拳。
这是我年轻时候住的房子。
这首歌使我想起了我年轻的时候。
我不允许你用我的钢笔。
他走出了房間。
寫日記是一個好習慣。
今天你要干什么？
Juan es mi hermano.
Mi hermano es taxista.
Ese reloj fue un regalo de mi mujer.
Estás preciosa.
La película que vimos anoche era divertidísima.
Quiero preguntarte algo.
